faq1Answer:
Member invite is not included in the Single Plan and can only be used alone. Up to 100 items are allowed and if using Location Mode, 3 locations are allowed. Also, adding options is not available for Single Plan.

The Business Plan allows member invites for up to 10 members for the team’s efficient management. Up to 2,000 items are allowed and if using Location Mode, 10 locations are allowed. Adding options is available anytime with an additional charge.
faq1Question: What’s the difference between the Single Plan and Business Plan?
faq2Answer:
The pricing remains the same, but the accessibility count differs a bit.

  • Multi Mode: The accessibility is counted by the number of registered sub-items.
  • Location Mode: The accessibility is counted by the plan.
    • Single Plan : 3 location (Adding options unavailable)
    • Business Plan : 10 locations (Adding up to 100 locations available / $10 for 10 locations per month)

For more information on each mode, please check out here or the team creating page.
faq2Question: Is the pricing different if using another mode than the Basic Mode?
faq3Answer:
When creating a team on BoxHero, a 1-month free trial for the Business Plan is applied automatically.

If a paid subscription is not made by the end of the free trial, the team will be switched to the Single plan automatically.
faq3Question: How do I select a plan?
faq4Answer:
Payment information is NOT required for the free trial.

You can start, check it out first and then decide whether you wish to start a subscription.

* If you register your payment information during the trial, the subscription will start once the trial is over.
faq4Question: Do I need to register my payment information to start a free trial?
faq5Answer:
After the Business Plan free trial, your team will be automatically switched to the Single Plan for free and your data will NOT be deleted.

* The accessibility must be checked to meet the Single Plan’s to prevent any usage restriction.
faq5Question: What happens when the 1-month free trial is over?
faq6Answer: As long as one person from the team makes a payment, it is regarded as a paid team. Therefore, other teammates are not required to make a payment.
faq6Question: Does my teammate also have to pay?
faq7Answer:
Because payment is required for each team on BoxHero,

please make a subscription payment from each team settings for the Business Plan.
faq7Question: How do I pay if I want to use several teams?
faq8Answer:
To provide a seamless service, BoxHero’s payment system is Stripe, a globally verified payment system for its security.

Users can process the payment with cards (Visa, Mastercard, etc.) authorized for the international payment.
faq8Question: What's the payment method on BoxHero?
faq9Answer:
From the Payment & Settings menu, you can cancel your subscription for the next billing date by clicking the ‘Unsubscribe’ button.

On the next billing date, your team will be automatically switched to the Single Plan. Restoring the cancellation is available before the next billing date.

* Please be reminded that a refund is unavailable for an already paid subscription.
faq9Question: How do I cancel my payment or request a refund?

Please check out the FAQ below for more information.
